description:
Does job hunting have you exhausted? Are you nervous about nailing a job interview?

This app is a complete blueprint for landing your dream job, from finding to securing it. Let professionals and job interviewers explain how to find a position that is aligned with your skills and compensates you well. 

We’ve included tips from actual CEOs and hiring managers on topics like: 
• Most common interview questions, and the answers they’re looking for
• How to negotiate the highest salary possible
• Things to AVOID saying during your job interview
• A paragraph to include in your cover letter that will generate a response 98% of the time
• The top 5 factors that managers use to determine whether or not you get hired

Plus a whole lot more, including downloadable resume and cover letter templates that are PROVEN to work.

**Note: This app functions best with the latest version of iOS **

---------------------------------------
***Reviews***
---------------------------------------
“Thanks to this free app, I have completely re-worked my resume. Now the next time I search for a new job I will watch the videos all over again to feel confident and prepared for my job interview. I always know I will succeed because my secret weapon, “How to Get a Job Interview” is right there in my pocket”. – Ali Gorelova,  iPadsHouse.com
trackCensoredName: How to Get a Job Interview
trackName: How to Get a Job Interview
releaseNotes: Various bug updates which caused older versions of the iPad app to sometimes crash.
